document_data.name: Foebreaker
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Foebreaker''''' was a unique [[enchanted]] [[maul]] from the city of [[Baldur's Gate]].

{{quote|As heavy and opposed to nonsense as the wearied hammer of a sentencing magistrate.}}
document_data.Powers: ''Foebreaker'' possessed a strong ''+2'' enchantment that guided the wielder's hands towards the target and made the maul's attacks more powerful and deadly. Its enchantments also made ''Foebreaker'' into a truly lethal weapon what dealt normal damage even to creatures and objects that otherwise would be immune or resistant to bludgeons.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, ''Foebreaker'' was locked safely away deep within magically sealed, trapped, and protected vaults of [[Ramazith's Tower]]. The tower's owner, [[Lorroakan]], kept the weapon locked inside the "[[Karsus]]" vault.
